$comment: What heroes are best for HT
Which heroes should I use in ht?
What are the top heroes for ht

embeds.title: Guide to Hero Trial
description<text>: • Do not put all of your heroes on the first line.
• After you level up a hero, update your defense (hero levels are not automatically updated).
• Use five heroes (a mid-level hero is better than a level-10 troops).
• If possible, use one or two healing heroes.
• The hero combo should be either *balanced* or *stacked*.
• A __balanced__ hero combo has a mix of healing, attack, defense, and crowd control. An example combo is Chione, Aly, Dracula, Seondeok, and Davison
• A __stacked__ hero combo emphasizes on a common buff from most of the heroes. An example combo is Chione, Dracula, Zeus, Drake, and Edward
